data.eml:eml: New leafhopper genera and species (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) which feed on Velloziaceae from Southern Africa, with a discussion of their trophobiosis

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stiller, Michael (2012): New leafhopper genera and species (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) which feed on Velloziaceae from Southern Africa, with a discussion of their trophobiosis. Zootaxa 3509: 35-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213100
